items.title: What we know about Maduro's capture and US plan to 'run' Venezuela
items.title_zh: 关于马杜罗的被俘 以及美国计划"运行"委内瑞拉
items.summary: The US has captured Venezuela's President Nicolás Maduro after a large-scale strike on the South American country, US President Donald Trump has said.
items.summary_zh: 美国在南美国家遭到大规模打击后俘虏了委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗,美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示.

items.title: Swiss open criminal case against managers of ski resort bar after deadly fire
items.title_zh: 瑞士针对滑雪胜地酒吧管理人员的公开刑事案件,死后起火
items.summary: The managers of a bar where a fire killed 40 people and injured another 119 have been placed under criminal investigation, Swiss prosecutors have said.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士检察官说,一家酒吧的管理人员已经接受刑事调查,该酒吧的火灾造成40人死亡,119人受伤。

items.title: Trump's toppling of Maduro is fraught with risk - what happens next is unclear
items.title_zh: 特朗普对马杜罗的推倒充满了风险-接下来会发生什么并不清楚
items.summary: The US may want many of its foes gone from power. It doesn't usually send in the military and physically remove them.
items.summary_zh: 美国可能希望其许多敌人从政权中消失。 通常不会派去军队,并实际去除.

items.title: Why has Trump attacked Venezuela and taken Maduro?
items.title_zh: 为什么特朗普攻击委内瑞拉并夺取了马杜罗?
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says the US is going to "run" Venezuela "until such time as we can do a safe, proper and judicious transition".
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)表示,美国将"运行"委内瑞拉","直到我们能够进行安全,适当和明智的过渡".

items.title: Trump on Venezuela: 'We are going to run the country'
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉的特朗普:"我们要管理这个国家".
items.summary: President Donald Trump announced that the US will run Venezuela until a 'proper transition can take place.'
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普宣布,

items.title: BBC reaches agreement with Israeli family for filming in home after 7 October without consent
items.title_zh: 英国广播公司与以色列家庭达成协议,10月7日之后在家中拍摄,未经同意。
items.summary: The BBC has reached an agreement with an Israeli family who survived the 7 October 2023 Hamas attacks, after a team of journalists entered their badly-damaged home without permission.
items.summary_zh: 英国广播公司与一个在2023年10月7日哈马斯袭击中幸存下来的以色列家庭达成协议,当时一群记者未经允许进入了他们被严重损坏的家.

items.title: Explosions and smoke at La Guaira port
items.title_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港的爆炸和烟雾
items.summary: Port La Guaira is Caracas' main conduit to the Caribbean Sea, located in Miranda state.
items.summary_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港是加拉加斯通向加勒比海的主要通道,位于米兰达州.

items.title: Craig the beer-ambassador elephant dies aged 54
items.title_zh: 克雷格... ...啤酒... ...桑萨多尔大象...
items.summary: A Kenyan elephant believed to have been one of Africa's largest male tuskers has died of old age.
items.summary_zh: 一头肯尼亚大象据信是非洲最大的雄性象牙之一,已年老而死.

items.title: Trump warning over Iran protests 'reckless' says foreign minister
items.title_zh: 外相说,
items.summary: Donald Trump's warning that the US will intervene if peaceful protesters are killed was "reckless and dangerous", Iran's foreign minister has said.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗外交部长唐纳德·特朗普警告,如果和平抗议者被杀死,美国将进行干预,这"无畏而危险".

items.title: More than 100 shelter overnight in Japan shrine due to heavy snow
items.title_zh: 日本神社一夜间有一百多所避难所 因为大雪
items.summary: More than 100 people have had to shelter in a shrine on a mountain top in Japan after heavy snowfall cut off access by road.
items.summary_zh: 在大雪断路后,超过100人不得不躲入日本山顶的神社.

items.title: Reporter in Caracas describes hearing loud bangs and planes
items.title_zh: 加拉加斯的记者描述听到响亮的爆炸声和飞机
items.summary: Reporter Ana Vanessa Herrero is in the Venezuelan capital Caracas - she said she began hearing planes at 02:00 local time.
items.summary_zh: 记者Ana Vanessa Herrero在委内瑞拉首都加拉加斯,

items.title: 'Living a nightmare': Families of teens missing after ski resort fire desperate for news
items.title_zh: "生活在噩梦": 在滑雪胜地火灾后失踪的十几岁家庭迫不及待的消息
items.summary: The families of teenagers missing after a fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort are facing an agonising wait for news and appealing for information about their loved ones online.
items.summary_zh: 在瑞士滑雪胜地的一家酒吧起火后失踪的青少年家庭,

items.title: Two people killed in magnitude 6.5 earthquake in Mexico
items.title_zh: 墨西哥6.5级地震造成2人死亡.
items.summary: At least two people have died after a powerful earthquake hit southern and central Mexico on Friday.
items.summary_zh: 星期五墨西哥南部和中部发生强烈地震后,至少有2人死亡。

items.title: Watch: Over 100 firefighters on the scene of Denver blaze
items.title_zh: 看:丹佛大火现场有100多名消防员
items.summary: The Colorado city of Denver was lit up by enormous fire on Friday evening, with over 100 firefighters on the scene to battle the blaze.
items.summary_zh: 科罗拉多州城市丹佛在星期五晚间被巨大的火灾所点燃,现场有超过100名消防员来与大火进行战斗.

items.title: Missile attack on Kharkiv kills two including child, authorities say
items.title_zh: 当局说,对哈尔科夫的导弹袭击造成两名儿童死亡
items.summary: Two people including a three-year-old child have been killed and around 28 others injured in a Russian strike on Kharkiv, Ukrainian officials have said.
items.summary_zh: 乌克兰官员说,在俄罗斯对哈尔科夫的一次袭击中,包括一名三岁儿童在内的两人被炸死,另有约28人受伤。

items.title: Saudi Arabia calls for Yemeni factions to attend 'dialogue' in Riyadh
items.title_zh: 沙特阿拉伯呼吁也门各派参加利雅得的“对话”。
items.summary: Saudi Arabia's foreign ministry has called for Yemen's southern factions to attend a "dialogue" in Riyadh, after a dramatic turn of events in the south brought Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates into unprecedented direct confrontation.
items.summary_zh: 沙特阿拉伯外交部呼吁也门南方各派别参加利雅得的"对话会",因为南方事变剧变使沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国陷入了前所未有的直接对抗.

items.title: Four challenges facing New York City Mayor Mamdani
items.title_zh: 纽约市市长马姆达尼面临的四项挑战
items.summary: On the first freezing winter day of 2026, surrounded by thousands of cheering New Yorkers and progressive Democratic allies, New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani pledged to tell a "new story of our city".
items.summary_zh: 2026年第一个被数千名欢呼的纽约人和进步民主同盟所包围的寒冬日,纽约市市长佐赫兰·马姆达尼承诺讲述"我们城市的新故事".

items.title: The year angry men dominated Bollywood - and what it means for India
items.title_zh: 这年愤怒的人主宰了宝莱坞 对印度来说意味着什么
items.summary: For the Indian film industry, 2025 felt like a return to familiar ground.
items.summary_zh: 对于印度电影业来说,2025年感觉就像回到了熟悉的地方.

items.title: 'Somewhere to put worker bees': Why Canada's micro-condos are losing their appeal
items.title_zh: "放工人蜂的地方": 为何加拿大的微型保险箱失去上诉权
items.summary: Maggie Hildebrand's first apartment in Toronto had a kitchen, a dining table, a workspace and a bed – all in the same 300-sq-ft room.
items.summary_zh: 玛姬·希尔德布兰德在多伦多的第一间公寓有厨房,餐桌,工作空间和床位——都在同一个300平方英尺的房间.

items.title: Young Italian golfer feared dead: What we know about Swiss resort fire
items.title_zh: 意大利青年高尔夫球员担心会死:瑞士度假胜地起火的我们所知
items.summary: A fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort has killed 40 people and injured another 119, officials say.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士滑雪胜地一酒吧起火 造成40人死亡再出119人受伤 官员称.

items.title: How K-beauty went from a viral trend to an economic powerhouse
items.title_zh: K -beauty如何从病毒趋势 变成经济强国
items.summary: Who would have thought serums infused with snail mucin - the sticky substance they secrete - would become a part of skincare routines around the world?
items.summary_zh: 谁能想到用蜗牛黏液喷入的血清 -- -- 他们所分泌的粘性物质 -- -- 将成为全世界皮肤护理常规的一部分?

items.title: Zelensky names spy chief to head presidential office after corruption row
items.title_zh: Zelensky在腐败排行后给总统办公室的 间谍负责人起名
items.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has named spy chief Kyrylo Budanov as his new chief of staff, just over a month after his previous top aide resigned in a corruption row.
items.summary_zh: 乌克兰总统瓦洛德米尔·泽连斯基(Volodymyr Zelensky)任命间谍长克列洛·布达诺夫为新任参谋长,就在他之前的高级助手在腐败一排辞职一个月后。

items.title: What images and videos tell us about why Swiss bar fire spread so quickly
items.title_zh: 图片和视频告诉我们为什么瑞士酒吧大火如此迅速蔓延
items.summary: Investigators are racing to establish how and why the deadly New Year's Eve fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort spread so rapidly.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士滑雪胜地的一家酒吧遭到致命的除夕会起火,

items.title: Watch: Earthquake interrupts Mexico's president during news conference
items.title_zh: 观察:地震在新闻发布会上打断了墨西哥总统
items.summary: President Claudia Sheinbaum calmly stopped her news conference when a 6.5 magnitude tremor shook the room and set off the country's earthquake alert system.
items.summary_zh: 总统克劳迪娅·谢因鲍姆平静地停止了她的新闻发布会,当时6.5级震颤震动了房间并启动了该国的地震警报系统.

items.title: Sailors saved from going over edge of huge dam
items.title_zh: 水手们从大坝上逃出
items.summary: Footage shows captured the moment four men were pulled to safety, after spending hours dangling off the edge of a 40m (130ft) dam in South Africa.
items.summary_zh: 4名男子被拖到安全的地方,

items.title: Watch: Moment 400-pound runaway prop injures Disney employee
items.title_zh: 看着:400磅跑道具 伤害了迪士尼员工
items.summary: Footage shows the moment a worker at Walt Disney World was injured after being hit by a 400-lb (180kg) runaway fake boulder prop.
items.summary_zh: Footage显示一名在华特迪士尼世界(Walt Disney World)的工人被一辆400磅(180克)跑去的假巨石道具撞倒后受伤.

items.title: 'You're invisible, you don't exist' - life without a birth certificate
items.title_zh: "你看不见,你不存在" - 没有出生证的生活
items.summary: Many people may take their birth certificate, or similar official papers, for granted - hidden in a drawer and rarely seeing the light of day - but for those without one, it can lead to a shadow life or an uncertain existence.
items.summary_zh: 许多人可以理所当然地领取出生证或类似的官方证件 -- -- 藏在抽屉里,很少看到白昼 -- -- 但对那些没有出生证的人来说,这会导致阴影的生活或不确定的存在。

items.title: What are Russians hoping for in 2026, asks Steve Rosenberg
items.title_zh: 2026年俄国人希望什么,问史蒂夫·罗森伯格
items.summary: As the New Year holiday gets underway, the BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg asks people on the streets of Moscow about their hopes for 2026 and how they see their future.
items.summary_zh: 随着新年假期的到来,BBC的俄罗斯编辑史蒂夫·罗森伯格(Steve Rosenberg)询问莫斯科街头的人们对2026年的希望,以及他们如何看待自己的未来.
